dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2512 IS: Enhance Access To SNAP Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Gillibrand (for herself, Mr. Fetterman, Mr. Merkley, Mr. Blumenthal, Ms. Slotkin, Mr. Sanders, Mr. Welch, Mr. Padilla, Mr. Booker, Mr. Wyden, Mrs. Shaheen, and Ms. Baldwin) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to remove certain eligibility disqualifications that restrict otherwise eligible students from participating in the supplemental nutrition assistance program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Enhance Access To SNAP Act of 2025 or the EATS Act of 2025.

section.header: Student eligibility under supplemental nutrition assistance program

subsection.text: Section 3(m)(5) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2012(m)(5)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: Individuals who are bona fide students enrolled at least half time in any recognized school, training program, or institution of higher education.

subsection.text: Section 6 of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2015) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (d)(2)(C), by striking (except that any such person enrolled in an institution of higher education shall be ineligible to participate in the supplemental nutrition assistance program unless he or she meets the requirements of subsection (e) of this section);
by redesignating subsections (f) through (s) as subsections (e) through (r), respectively.
Section 5 of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2014) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subsection (a), in the second sentence, by striking (g), and (r) and inserting (f), and (q); and
in subsection (i)(1), in the first sentence, by striking section 6(f)(2)(B) of this Act and inserting section 6(e)(2)(B).

paragraph.text: Section 6 of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2015) is amended—

clause.text: in subparagraph (B)(ii)(I)(bb)(DD), by striking subsection (o) and inserting subsection (n); and
in subparagraph (N), by striking subsection (o) each place it appears and inserting subsection (n); and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1)(B) of subsection (q) (as so redesignated), by striking subsection (k) and inserting subsection (j).

paragraph.text: Section 7(i)(1) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2016(i)(1)) is amended by striking section 6(o)(2) and inserting section 6(n)(2).
Section 11 of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2020) is amended—

clause.text: in paragraph (2)(B)(v)(II), by striking section 6(f) and inserting section 6(e); and
in paragraph (22), by striking section 6(i) and inserting section 6(h); and

subparagraph.text: in subsection (n), by striking section 6(g) and inserting section 6(f).

paragraph.text: Section 16(h) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2025(h)) is amended—

clause.text: in subparagraph (B)(ii), by striking section 6(o) and inserting section 6(n);

subclause.text: by striking section 6(o)(3) each place it appears and inserting section 6(n)(3);
by striking section 6(o)(2) each place it appears and inserting section 6(n)(2); and

item.text: in subclause (III), by striking section 6(o)(4) and inserting section 6(n)(4); and
in subclause (IV), by striking section 6(o)(6) and inserting section 6(n)(6); and

clause.text: in subparagraph (F)(ii)(III)(ee)(AA), by striking section 6(o) and inserting section 6(n); and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (5)(C)(iv)(I), by striking section 6(o)(2) and inserting section 6(n)(2).

paragraph.text: Section 17(m) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2026(m)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking (l) through (n) each place it appears and inserting (k) through (m); and
in paragraph (2)(E), by striking section 6(l)(2) and inserting section 6(k)(2).

paragraph.text: Section 103(a)(2)(D) of the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (29 U.S.C. 3113(a)(2)(D)) is amended by striking 6(o) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2015(o)) and inserting 6(n) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2015(n)).

Section 121(b)(2)(B)(iv) of the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (29 U.S.C. 3151(b)(2)(B)(iv)) is amended by striking 6(o) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2015(o)) and inserting 6(n) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2015(n)).
Section 454 of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 654) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (4)(A)(i)(IV), by striking 6(l)(1) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2015(l)(1)) and inserting 6(k)(1) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2015(k)(1));

in paragraph (6)(B)(i), by striking subsection (l) or (m) of section 6 of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 and inserting subsection (k) or (l) of section 6 of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2015); and

clause.text: by striking section 3(h) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2012(h)) each place it appears and inserting section 3 of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2012); and
in clause (ii), by striking section 6(l)(2) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2015(l)(2)) and inserting section 6(k)(2) of that Act (7 U.S.C. 2015(k)(2)).

section.text: This Act and the amendments made by this Act shall take effect on January 2, 2026.
